Phil Tyler( Dale ) . Pat Vern Harris( Sadie ) . Brenna DiStasio( Lee ) . Andrea CaÃ±izares-Fernandez( Teen Stella ) . Jeff Torres( Young Epi ) . Martin Lopez Lacci( Matias ) . Jared Sheldon( Randy ) . James Vincent Meredith( Mr. Dunlap ) . Brad Armacost( Randy ) . Vic Kuligoski( Tom ) . Tommy Malouf( Mark ) . Juan Pablo Pastrana( Student ) . Tracey Greenwood( Marianne ) . Kelly Felthous( Nina ) . Kathryn Acosta( Officer Novatny ) . Steve King( Roy ) . Madelyn DePorter( Secretary ) . Pat Reidy( Emcee ) . Nathaniel Elfant( Clerk ) . Todd Gillenardo( Utility Worker ) . Status Finished (2022–2022)
